Articles.Content:
I hereby request that two of my ships be added to the list, in the micro munar craft category. The Bare Minimun II, http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13953.0

and EZ Minimun II,

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14093.0

i want to get my page up on the stock repository i have 7 ships and 2 to come on this page... http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13373.0 they should all fit in the Munar Craft category all 7 ships are stock

Here\'s Mine. The Fargo. Lands via lots of chutes comfortably in the water, drives back on land, or a conventional runway landing.

Look at it compared to some of those puny fighters.
The Space Turkey, a rocket which reduces mass and conserves fuel by using ramjets to leave the atmosphere.

I request my ships be added, Kerbin Hope.craft (version 1) Is able to achieve 100km orbit above kerbin and rescue other ships/perform movements in orbit and land on runway. Kerbin HopeV2.craft (version 2) Is able to orbit kerbin, perform rescue missions, burn to high orbit. Land on Minimus and mun and return to kerbin and land on runway. (Possible to land on both minimus and mun in one mission.

@darnocslew - Thak you for sharing your designs. How about posting a couple of pictures of your two craft? Or better yet, start a separate thread about them for others to give feedback, and link to that thread here (as others do with their creations).

I understand the Search box must be an extremely difficult thing to use... : Here let me do the work for you:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14699.msg222061#msg222061

Pictures and video are provided.

Name: Far-lander 6

a rocket that kurtjmac build in his video

Mod: N/A

Take off speed: 17m/s

Stages: 3

Total engine: Stage one- 6, stage two-3, stage three- 1

total fuel cell: Stage one-24, stage two-9, stage three-3

uses: Orbit/ Munar

http://www./?0fc512qjkw5zy9r

I wish to submit my super lifter design to this forums http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14990.msg226054#msg226054

It lifts 70 kerbal tons into low orbit and anything less into high orbit.
Is the OP still being updated?

Here\'s the craft Humana-III, of course, it\'s mine, but in any case, it is really easy to fly into orbit.

Also, it\'s unique design (Building outwards, not down) makes it extremely stable. Not saying you should fly without SAS on or something. Oh, and if it starts spinning, just ignore it.

Here are some pictures depicting a whole mission!

@Bioman222,

Could you please add to your post some screenshots of your craft in action and perhaps a few words about the design so that people can see if it\'s something they want to download and try?

Anyone in the mood for a MUNAR CAPABLE SHUTTLE? yes? well good then, I would like to add the Gaouami V Antlantis (M) to the considered list to be in the repository. It is capable of munar injection with only three hold points in the launch, it can orbit and return safely to Kerbin. This is the peak of a month and a half of designs. However, these designs were based in .15, further on I have updated the system for .16

Edited August 19, 2012 by that1guy

[stock 0.16] 3-kerbal Mun/Minmus lander:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16657.0

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16944.0

I would like to put forward two designs from MoX industries one space shuttle and one mun rocket.

I would like to have my new Mun Lander Design added David XII

The Link is to my thread so there is WAY more info there.
Could I get my new stock 0.16 Heavy Lifter System 'Scarab HLS' added to the list? (Click picture for main thread and downloads)
Just wanted to mention that none of the links on the list lead to the expected page, they just dump into the main forum page.
Should this thread be archived? All the craft on the OP are not compatible with 0.16 if it is true that the craft file format has changed.

Could I get my new stock 0.16 Heavy Lifter System 'Scarab HLS' added to the list? (Click picture for main thread and downloads)

Since the forum change your link doesn't work.

Just wanted to say that's an interesting looking rocket. Putting the RCS on decouplers like that -- fascinating idea. Is that to get greater leverage, or just more room?
Links don't work for me. Help?

With the move from Simple Machines to vBulletin, all the old links have broken, and it is down to the creators of their threads to repair the links, a daunting task.

The best option for now is to use the search box to find the craft that interests you.

The best option for now is to use the search box to find the craft that interests you.

But I'm just starting out and I don't know what craft interest me...

I would like to request that my Gourami V class shuttle be considered for the stock repository. With proper booster configuration, such as on the GV Aqueon, the Gourami V system can land on the Mun. I am including several pics, there are vids on how to fly the ship at these links (these are the .16 compatible versions)

Edited August 22, 2012 by that1guy
I'm a new member here. When I click on a link to view one of the stock rockets, it redirects me to the forum homepage. Any reason for this?
Those are links from before the forum migrated to vBulletin. I'm guessing that's why they don't work.
